DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate how systematic physical training after endovascular treatment influence the durability of the endovascular treatment and how it effects physical function, quality of life and future cardiovascular events.
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity, Function and Quality of Life in Patients After Endovascular Treatment
DOC.criteria: 55 years old or older successful endovascular living in Oslo or in the close area being able to come to physical training classes at the hospital endovascular treatment on studyleg last 2 years other reasons for reduced walking function than peripheral arterial disease
